message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 11-5-1, translated into en
data: The Departments of Agriculture and Rural Development of the provinces/cities directly under the Central Government shall report the data according to the form No. 005.H/BCB-NNPTNT and send it to the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development. The Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development summarizes and calculates data on "Number of deaths, missing and injured people due to natural disasters per hundred thousand people" and sends it to the General Statistics Office
